snippet: The judge wants to extradite police officials who are accused of torturing opponents of the dictatorship until 1975, when Francisco Franco died.
abstract: Argentine Judge Maria Romilda Servini de Cubria is seeking to extradite and try Spanish police officials Jesus Munecas and Antonio Gonzalez Pacheco accused of torturing opponents of regime under Francisco Franco, dictator who died in 1975.
lead_paragraph: The judge wants to extradite police officials who are accused of torturing opponents of the dictatorship until 1975, when Francisco Franco died.

headline.main: Argentine Judge Seeks to Put Franco Officials on Trial
headline.print_headline: Argentina Seeks Spanish Officials’ Extradition for Franco-Era Abuses
